Description.Text: Park Dedeman Trabzon is a friendly 4-star property offering modern accommodation in Yorma, east of Trabzon. Highlights include a gym, free Wi-Fi and a restaurant. Trabzon is a bustling port city on the Black Sea coast of northeast Turkey. It is located on the historical Silk Road and became a melting pot of religions, languages and culture for centuries. Places of interest include Aya Sofya, Ataturk's Villa, Trabzon Museum, Boztepe Park, Sumela Monastery and the picturesque lake, village and surrounding valley of Uzungol. The hotel is housed in a 20th-century mid-rise building with Neoclassical features. Facilities include a gym, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Superior Mountain View rooms are 30sqm and decorated in a modern style. Amenities include air-conditioning, a mini-bar, 42-inch flat-screen TV, tea and coffee equipment, and an en-suite bathroom. The onsite restaurant serves regional and international dishes in a relaxed setting. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the lobby bar, and snacks at the hotel's mini-mart. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
